title: Did You Have a New Year’s Dream?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Shioriko-chan, did you have a new year’s dream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Hmm, I think I did, but I can’t remember.... I felt happy, though, so it was probably a good dream.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin hopes so nya~! Rin also had a new year’s dream!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’d love to hear the details of your dream, Rin-san. I imagine it would be a great adventure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Shioriko-chan, are you psychic!? That’s right nya, it was amazing! So, first, Rin was on this spaceship. In it, there was you as a raccoon and Kayochin as a flower nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, so I’m accompanying you as a raccoon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>To become the most popular beetle store, we went to a planet full of greenery to catch some. Then Rin saw Maki-chan and Shizuku-chan inside a glass case with a Mount Fuji picture on it, so Rin helped them out. After that, Rina-chan and Yoshiko-chan came chasing after us, riding on around 100 hamsters. We were so surprised that we went inside a cave to hide. There we found Kasumin as a bear that was hibernating....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That is.... quite the dream, alright.... So, what happened then? Did you get attacked by the Kasumi-san bear....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>No. Kasumin was fluffy and felt so comfy, so we snuggled against her back and took a nap. But before Rin knew it, both the cave and Kasumin had disappeared, and we were suddenly riding on a hot air balloon nya. While in the air, we saw Ruby-chan and Hanamaru-chan get caught by a hawk....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>What an adventure....! Please tell me the rest of the story! What about the eggplant!? Did an eggplant show up!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
